mapper.sql: LLC_ID, PROTOCOL_TYPE, LLC_NAME, LLC_TYPE, LLC_MODEL, LLC_MODE, LLC_MODE_SET_TIME, LLC_MODE_SET_ORIGINATOR, AVAILABLE, SYSTEM_STATE, ALARM_STATE, COMM_STATE, CONTROL_STATE, FROM_LLC_QUEUE_NAME, TO_LLC_QUEUE_NAME, H_SHOW_STATE, H_SHOW_STATE_SET_TIME, H_SHOW_MODE, H_SHOW_MODE_SET_TIME, AREA, MACS_IP_ADDRESS, MACS_PORT_ID, MACS_DEVICE_ID, E10_STATE, E10_STATE_SET_TIME, E10_STATE_SET_ORIGINATOR, DISPLAY_FLG, DATA_SYNC_FLG, SYNC_RETRY, LAST_EXECUTION_TIME, FINISHED_TIME, TIME_SYNC_FLG
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from LLC
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into LLC (LLC_ID, PROTOCOL_TYPE, LLC_NAME, LLC_TYPE, LLC_MODEL, LLC_MODE, LLC_MODE_SET_TIME, LLC_MODE_SET_ORIGINATOR, AVAILABLE, SYSTEM_STATE, ALARM_STATE, COMM_STATE, CONTROL_STATE, FROM_LLC_QUEUE_NAME, TO_LLC_QUEUE_NAME, H_SHOW_STATE, H_SHOW_STATE_SET_TIME, H_SHOW_MODE, H_SHOW_MODE_SET_TIME, AREA, MACS_IP_ADDRESS, MACS_PORT_ID, MACS_DEVICE_ID, E10_STATE, E10_STATE_SET_TIME, E10_STATE_SET_ORIGINATOR, DISPLAY_FLG, DATA_SYNC_FLG, SYNC_RETRY, LAST_EXECUTION_TIME, FINISHED_TIME, TIME_SYNC_FLG ) values (#{llcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{protocolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{llcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{llcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{llcModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{llcMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{llcModeSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{llcModeSetOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{available,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromLlcQueueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toLlcQueueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hShowState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hShowStateSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hShowMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hShowModeSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{macsIpAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{macsPortId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{macsDeviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{e10State,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{e10StateSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{e10StateSetOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataSyncFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syncRetry,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastExecutionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finishedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeSyncFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update LLC
LLC_ID = #{record.llcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROTOCOL_TYPE = #{record.protocolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_NAME = #{record.llcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_TYPE = #{record.llcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_MODEL = #{record.llcModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_MODE = #{record.llcMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_MODE_SET_TIME = #{record.llcModeSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_MODE_SET_ORIGINATOR = #{record.llcModeSetOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AVAILABLE = #{record.available,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSTEM_STATE = #{record.systemState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALARM_STATE = #{record.alarmState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMM_STATE = #{record.commState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTROL_STATE = #{record.controlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FROM_LLC_QUEUE_NAME = #{record.fromLlcQueueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TO_LLC_QUEUE_NAME = #{record.toLlcQueueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
H_SHOW_STATE = #{record.hShowState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
H_SHOW_STATE_SET_TIME = #{record.hShowStateSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
H_SHOW_MODE = #{record.hShowMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
H_SHOW_MODE_SET_TIME = #{record.hShowModeSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA = #{record.area,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MACS_IP_ADDRESS = #{record.macsIpAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MACS_PORT_ID = #{record.macsPortId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MACS_DEVICE_ID = #{record.macsDeviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
E10_STATE = #{record.e10State,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
E10_STATE_SET_TIME = #{record.e10StateSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
E10_STATE_SET_ORIGINATOR = #{record.e10StateSetOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAY_FLG = #{record.displayFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_SYNC_FLG = #{record.dataSyncFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNC_RETRY = #{record.syncRetry,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_EXECUTION_TIME = #{record.lastExecutionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINISHED_TIME = #{record.finishedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME_SYNC_FLG = #{record.timeSyncFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update LLC set LLC_ID = #{record.llcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROTOCOL_TYPE = #{record.protocolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_NAME = #{record.llcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_TYPE = #{record.llcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_MODEL = #{record.llcModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_MODE = #{record.llcMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_MODE_SET_TIME = #{record.llcModeSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_MODE_SET_ORIGINATOR = #{record.llcModeSetOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVAILABLE = #{record.available,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTEM_STATE = #{record.systemState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALARM_STATE = #{record.alarmState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMM_STATE = #{record.commState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTROL_STATE = #{record.controlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_LLC_QUEUE_NAME = #{record.fromLlcQueueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_LLC_QUEUE_NAME = #{record.toLlcQueueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H_SHOW_STATE = #{record.hShowState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H_SHOW_STATE_SET_TIME = #{record.hShowStateSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H_SHOW_MODE = #{record.hShowMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H_SHOW_MODE_SET_TIME = #{record.hShowModeSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA = #{record.area,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MACS_IP_ADDRESS = #{record.macsIpAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MACS_PORT_ID = #{record.macsPortId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MACS_DEVICE_ID = #{record.macsDeviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, E10_STATE = #{record.e10State,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, E10_STATE_SET_TIME = #{record.e10StateSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, E10_STATE_SET_ORIGINATOR = #{record.e10StateSetOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAY_FLG = #{record.displayFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_SYNC_FLG = #{record.dataSyncFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYNC_RETRY = #{record.syncRetry,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_EXECUTION_TIME = #{record.lastExecutionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINISHED_TIME = #{record.finishedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_SYNC_FLG = #{record.timeSyncFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LLC
PROTOCOL_TYPE = #{protocolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_NAME = #{llcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_TYPE = #{llcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_MODEL = #{llcModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_MODE = #{llcMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_MODE_SET_TIME = #{llcModeSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LLC_MODE_SET_ORIGINATOR = #{llcModeSetOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AVAILABLE = #{available,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSTEM_STATE = #{systemState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALARM_STATE = #{alarmState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMM_STATE = #{commState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTROL_STATE = #{controlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FROM_LLC_QUEUE_NAME = #{fromLlcQueueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TO_LLC_QUEUE_NAME = #{toLlcQueueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
H_SHOW_STATE = #{hShowState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
H_SHOW_STATE_SET_TIME = #{hShowStateSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
H_SHOW_MODE = #{hShowMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
H_SHOW_MODE_SET_TIME = #{hShowModeSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA = #{area,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MACS_IP_ADDRESS = #{macsIpAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MACS_PORT_ID = #{macsPortId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MACS_DEVICE_ID = #{macsDeviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
E10_STATE = #{e10State,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
E10_STATE_SET_TIME = #{e10StateSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
E10_STATE_SET_ORIGINATOR = #{e10StateSetOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISPLAY_FLG = #{displayFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_SYNC_FLG = #{dataSyncFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNC_RETRY = #{syncRetry,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_EXECUTION_TIME = #{lastExecutionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINISHED_TIME = #{finishedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIME_SYNC_FLG = #{timeSyncFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where LLC_ID = #{llcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LLC set PROTOCOL_TYPE = #{protocolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_NAME = #{llcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_TYPE = #{llcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_MODEL = #{llcModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_MODE = #{llcMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_MODE_SET_TIME = #{llcModeSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LLC_MODE_SET_ORIGINATOR = #{llcModeSetOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVAILABLE = #{available,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSTEM_STATE = #{systemState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALARM_STATE = #{alarmState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMM_STATE = #{commState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTROL_STATE = #{controlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_LLC_QUEUE_NAME = #{fromLlcQueueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_LLC_QUEUE_NAME = #{toLlcQueueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H_SHOW_STATE = #{hShowState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H_SHOW_STATE_SET_TIME = #{hShowStateSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H_SHOW_MODE = #{hShowMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H_SHOW_MODE_SET_TIME = #{hShowModeSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MACS_IP_ADDRESS = #{macsIpAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MACS_PORT_ID = #{macsPortId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MACS_DEVICE_ID = #{macsDeviceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, E10_STATE = #{e10State,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, E10_STATE_SET_TIME = #{e10StateSetTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, E10_STATE_SET_ORIGINATOR = #{e10StateSetOriginator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAY_FLG = #{displayFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_SYNC_FLG = #{dataSyncFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYNC_RETRY = #{syncRetry,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_EXECUTION_TIME = #{lastExecutionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINISHED_TIME = #{finishedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_SYNC_FLG = #{timeSyncFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LLC_ID = #{llcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT L.LLC_ID, L.LLC_NAME, L.LLC_TYPE, L.CONTROL_STATE, L.SYSTEM_STATE, L.ALARM_STATE, L.COMM_STATE, L.LLC_MODE, L.AVAILABLE, (CASE WHEN L.LLC_TYPE = 'CDC' THEN 1 WHEN L.LLC_TYPE = 'OHBC' THEN 1 WHEN L.LLC_TYPE = 'OHBC2' THEN 1 ELSE 7 END)ICON_TYPE ,T.TSC_ID
FROM LLC L left outer join TSC T on L.LLC_ID = T.LLC_ID JOIN MODULE M ON L.LLC_ID = M.LLC_ID WHERE L.LLC_TYPE = #{llcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND M.MODULE_NAME = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DISPLAY_FLG = 1
ORDER BY L.LLC_ID

SELECT DISTINCT LLC_TYPE,
(case L.LLC_TYPE when 'AGVC' then 100 ELSE 1 end) TYPE
FROM LLC L LEFT OUTER JOIN MODULE M ON L.LLC_ID = M.LLC_ID WHERE M.MODULE_NAME = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY TYPE,REPLACE(LLC_TYPE,'DWCC') ASC
mapper.sql: L.LLC_ID, L.PROTOCOL_TYPE, L.LLC_NAME, L.LLC_TYPE, L.LLC_MODEL, L.LLC_MODE, L.LLC_MODE_SET_TIME, L.LLC_MODE_SET_ORIGINATOR, L.AVAILABLE, L.SYSTEM_STATE, L.ALARM_STATE, L.COMM_STATE, L.CONTROL_STATE, L.FROM_LLC_QUEUE_NAME, L.TO_LLC_QUEUE_NAME, L.H_SHOW_STATE, L.H_SHOW_STATE_SET_TIME, L.H_SHOW_MODE, L.H_SHOW_MODE_SET_TIME, L.AREA, L.MACS_IP_ADDRESS, L.MACS_PORT_ID, L.MACS_DEVICE_ID, L.E10_STATE, L.E10_STATE_SET_TIME, L.E10_STATE_SET_ORIGINATOR, L.DISPLAY_FLG, L.DATA_SYNC_FLG, L.SYNC_RETRY, L.LAST_EXECUTION_TIME, L.FINISHED_TIME, L.TIME_SYNC_FLG, T.TSC_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from LLC L left outer join TSC T on L.LLC_ID = T.LLC_ID
order by ${orderByClause}
